alert.note: Alert for Bossier; Caddo (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 17 at 2:11PM CDT until April 17 at 2:45PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM CDT FOR WEST CENTRAL CADDO AND WEST CENTRAL BOSSIER PARISHES... At 210 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Oil City, or 20 miles northwest of Shreveport, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Shreveport, Bossier City, Blanchard, Benton, Oil City, Mooringsport, Belcher, Gilliam, Fosters, Dixie, Alden Bridge, Caddo Lake, Ferguson, Linton, Cavett and Barksdale Air Force Base. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
